text: @ThisIsMadness5 @Uber The virus isn't deadly in sense of killing everyone sporadically, but it targets elders and HRG. It's nothing like flu which kills 600K out of 1 billion (0.1%) in 2019 where as as it has claimed over 400K over out 8 millions confirmed cases in 4 months only.
